name: Starfall Survivor
description: Dual-mode auto shooter with roguelike elements. Survive waves of enemies in space.

name: Neon Racer
description: High-speed cyberpunk racing through neon-lit cityscapes.

name: Pixel Dungeon
description: Classic dungeon crawler with procedurally generated levels.

name: Cyber Chess
description: Strategic chess with a cyberpunk twist and special abilities.
